The machine was beeping, and Trunks looked at the monitor. The screen read, "Currently in requested time. Location was recalculated to ensure safe re-entry." Trunks nodded, that made sense to him, that's a critical component. They could have appeared inside a rock if that wasn't in the time machine.

Trunks landed on the ground next to the boy. "Hey! Hey kid!" The kid was so worked up he didn't even notice Trunks, until he approached him and put a hand on his shoulder. "Kid, calm down! Are you ok? What's your name?"

The young boy sniffled and spoke, "M-my name's Gohan. I'm stuck on top of this mountain and I can't get down! Are you here to help me?"

"I wanna help you, but there's something important I need to find first." Said Trunks, but was quickly met with Gohan beginning to tear up again. "I promise I'll come back!"

"Wow, what a crybaby," Trunks thought. He looked around to the world below and spotted an apple tree. "I'll get you some food real quick, ok?" Said Trunks. Gohan held back his tears and nodded, and Trunks leaped off the mountain down to tree, and quickly grabbed as many apples as the boy could carry, and flew back up to Gohan. "This should be enough for a while." Said Trunks.

"Wow! Thanks mister Trunks!" said the young boy, who happily wagged his tail as he took an apple and took a big bite out of it.

As Gohan curbed his hunger pains, Trunks decided to ask a quick question, "Hey Gohan, how old are you?"

Gohan swallowed his piece of apple and held up 4 fingers, "four and a half."

"Four huh?" Said Trunks. His mind wandered around the idea. "Four? Wow he started training when he was really young. No wonder he's so strong when he's grown up. He's a little younger than Goten now, but I guess it's close enough."

141.content:
A few weeks after Master Roshi has shrunken himself with Bulma's Shrink Watch to spy on Launch like the old pervert he is, Goku sat at the kitchen table and does what he do best--stuffing his face with food!

When he had finished, he noticed something shiny on the floor, a few inches from one of the table legs.

"Huh? What's that?" he asked curiously, he got down on his hands and knees under the table and crawled toward the shiny object that turned out be a wrist watch. He picked it up and examined it with childish curiosity. "Oh, I know!!" he exclaimed. "This is Bulma's! Guess I should return this to her!" Smiling innocently, he put the watch on his wrist. While putting it on, he unknowingly nudged the button on the side with his finger.

As he finished putting on the watch, it crackled with electricity and exploded in a puff of smoke!


"Aww," whined Goku, looking disappointed. "It's broken." then he shrugged happily. "Oh well, I'm sure Bulma can fix it."

Then he noticed his surrounding and let out a startled scream of horror!

"What?! How did everything get so big?! Guess they all grew up while I wasn't looking..."

Unbeknownst to Goku, everything did not grow, he simply shrunk to the size of an action figure, which is about 6 to 8 inches tall.

A giant foot stepped over the doorway to the kitchen, it was....

1411.content:
It was Krillin, now about the size of an average house, at least from Goku's point of view.

"Goku?" Krillin asked, looking around the kitchen. "Well that's odd, I could've sworn I heard him stuffing his face a minute ago..."

"Krillin! Down here!" Goku yelled, jumping up and down, waving his arms.

Krillin looked down and let out a cry of shock, falling backward and landing painfully on his butt on the hard kitchen floor

"What the heck--? GOKU, HOW DID YOU GET SO SMALL?!" yelled Krilin, still in shock at his discovery

"OW!" Goku yelled, covering his sensitive ears. "Not so loud, Krillin!"

"Oh, sorry, Goku." Krillin said as he reached down and picked Goku up by the tail, which pained and weakened Goku to the point of being too weak to even speak. He hung limply by his tail in Krillin's fingers, looking totally out of it, his orange-gi-clad butt held high. "But how did you get so small?" And then he laid Goku in the palm of his other hand, releasing his tail

With his strength returning, Goku sat up in Kriillin's hand. "I didn't get small, silly, everything just got to big!"

Krillin smacked himself on the forehead at his friend's naive behavior and groaned.

"Goku," Krillin said, still holding his forehead, looking annoyed and bored. "You've shrunk, it's impossible for everything except you to grow this much!" he gestured around the room.

"I...shrunk...?" asked a very confused Goku, and then his face lit up. "Oh! So that's what this watch does! It shrinks me!" and then he sighed sadly. "It's too bad it's broken..."

A mischievous grin spread across Krillin's face as he look at his shrunken friend and thought of all the things he can do with him. And Goku, being...well, Goku, he wouldn't complain or resist to anything he decides to do with him....

info.brief_description: Choose a kid DBZ character and have them shrunken by Bulma's old Shrink Watch!
info.description:
Dragonball Z series or (Dragonball via Time Machine) No Dragonball GT!

Rules:

No vore or gross stuff, such as inserting the kid into any giant body parts, this story only allows touching, stroking, rubbing, licking, petting and played with as a toy and kept as a pet. You may insert the shrunken kid into the giant's mouth as long as they do not chew or swallow them. Sucking and licking is allowed. Eating, chewing, biting or swallowing are disallowed.

Nudity and sexual pleasures is allowed, such masturbating the shrunken kid with a finger.

No interaction with females, they can be seen or mentioned, but no interaction between them and the shrunken kid.

No short chapters, such as ones with less than 5 sentences.

You can create your own character to capture the shrunken kid if you want to, though I'd prefer other DBZ characters being the captor, I'll allow you to create your own non-DBZ character just to get more writers and readers.

The kid can't grow back to normal, and once the size of the shrunken kid is chosen, it cannot be changed, he cannot be bigger or smaller, once he's, let say, 6 inches, he remains at that height forever and while tiny, the kid doesn't age in the years that follows!

When you choose a character to shrink, don't say how small he is, I want other readers to choose a height and create their own storyline from there. Put in the choices things like "Trunks is 8 inches" and other ransom height numbers.

Height rule: A shrunken character should be no more than 12 inches and no less than 3 inches, I don't want them to be too small. 3 inches through 12 inches are your options to put in the choices in the chapter where the character shrinks. 3 inches is the smallest you can make them and 12 inches is the limit.

Keep the story endless!

Other than that, go nuts

Writers wanted! C'mon, don't be shy, write in this story!
